subline: My name is Felipe Bandeira, this is my personal-about-professional blog about career, life, people, projects and other related subjects in tech. I'm aware that I may post something wrong, or that goes against some people beliefs. With that in mind, I want to make it clear that I'm open to well-mannered discussions, so if you feel like, get in touch and let's discuss and learn together. :)
aboutProject: This blog is a PWA, that means you can save it for offline reading.
seeMorePWA: You can learn more about PWA here
